last_episode_to_air.name: Can't Get Right
last_episode_to_air.overview: Back in Atlanta, Porsha prepares for Pilar's upcoming surgery, while Aunt Liz hopes to reunite the family at the grand opening of Hosea Helps. Porsha and Dennis attempt to finalize the details of their co-parenting plan.

name: The Real Housewives of Atlanta: Porsha's Family Matters
original_name: The Real Housewives of Atlanta: Porsha's Family Matters
overview: In the aftermath of a whirlwind romance and an engagement that broke the internet, Porsha Williams's extended family is heavily involved in her personal drama, and as each person chimes in with their unfiltered opinions, tensions rise.

episodes.name: The Legendary Ms. Williams
episodes.overview: With a milestone birthday approaching, Porsha makes moves to celebrate and settle into a new life with her fianc√©, Simon. Meanwhile, her family begins to question the speed of her engagement, and Dennis struggles to fully support Porsha's love life.

episodes.name: Guess Who's Coming to Lunch
episodes.overview: An unexpectedly emotional cookout leaves the whole family with questions. Porsha grapples with the future of her blended family, and Simon is put on the hotseat by Porsha's protective tribe. Dennis navigates his role as father and co-parent and Mama Gina turns a lunch with Porsha into a real "tea" party.

episodes.name: Not Without My Robe
episodes.overview: As the entire family prepares for their trip to Mexico, Porsha and Lauren focus on getting Simon and Dennis to join the retreat; Lauren's plan for family healing comes to a halt when Porsha finds out Dennis' intentions may not be genuine.

episodes.name: Dennis the Menace
episodes.overview: With the family in turmoil, Porsha's vision of a blended family looks more bleak than blended. Lauren struggles to maintain control of the spiritual path she had envisioned, and Dennis breaks the rules by bringing a surprise guest.

episodes.name: Spiling The Tea - quila
episodes.overview: As the family vacation continues, Dennis pleads with the family to look out for Porsha. Lauren holds Porsha accountable for her actions, and a day of fun leads to an unexpected night that may destroy Porsha's hopes for a blended family.

episodes.name: Ghost of Porsha's Past
episodes.overview: Family tensions explode past the point of no return, leaving Porsha's blended family in limbo. Back in Atlanta, Porsha has to pick up the pieces and navigate through the mess left behind.

episodes.name: Can't Get Right
episodes.overview: Back in Atlanta, Porsha prepares for Pilar's upcoming surgery, while Aunt Liz hopes to reunite the family at the grand opening of Hosea Helps. Porsha and Dennis attempt to finalize the details of their co-parenting plan.
